summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Replacement Toothbrush Heads Compatible For Oral-B Braun Electric Toothbrush ,Sensitive brush heads Extra soft bristles. 8 Count Review Date: 2019/01/15 Store: YuanJian Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'YuanJian', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Kid', 'Item Firmness Description': 'Extra Soft', 'Number of Pieces': '8', 'Item Form': 'ROUND', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.43 x 0.39 x 2.76 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'UPC': '633337444805'} Review Text: 8 count circular sensitive bristles. The can go on most oral-b units, but to ensure it'll work out for you please look up compatibility before you purchase. In my experience the electric motion and dentist like modeling makes for shiny clean teeth! Definitely cleaner then just a regular rectangular plastic toothbrush. (Say that 5 times fast, lol) Review Title: Clean teef-ies Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Snowflakes Beauty Sponge Makeup Blender-Latex Free， Tear Drop Shape Sponge Flawless Coverage of Powder, Cream, Liquid. (Pink) Review Date: 2019/01/19 Store: Snowflakes Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Snowflakes', 'Material': 'Rubber', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Makeup', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '2.3 x 1.8 x 1.7 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'UPC': '738598331618'} Review Text: Quality make up brush. Use the points side under eyes; the round on forehead, cheeks and chin/neck area. I have really sensitive skin, but it didn't mind the blending. Super easy to wash using shampoo or hand soap. Nice product that will help you blend to your heart's content! Review Title: Easy peasy Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Segbeauty empty bottle 290 Review Date: 2019/09/10 Store: TruuMe Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Segbeauty', 'Color': 'Clear', 'Material Type Free': 'Dairy Free', 'Item Weight': '3.4 Ounces', 'Bottle Nipple Type': 'Vented', 'Package Dimensions': '7.99 x 3.19 x 2.24 inches; 3.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'AM-160083-03', 'UPC': '701822757553 701822760621'} Review Text: Thoughts:
If you have curly hair you inevitably come acrossed frizzy hair or lax curls after long day or bed Head. Using this fine most spray allows one to refresh curly, tame frizzes. Although I don't iron, I can understand how it could be useful in that activity too. It mists so fine without soaking. The trigger is long pull, but simple and easy to squeeze even with someone with arthritis. Love this product, fantastic addition to my hair styling products!!

Details:
Volume: 160ml. Size: 7.8 × 2.1in (198 × 53mm). Weight: 3.4oz (99g) Material: PET (Polyethylene terephthalate). Spray duration: 1.2 seconds per compression or even lasts for 5 senconds if pressing it longer.. Operation: No pumping required, just press trigger and get a nice steady stream spray. Ideal for hair styling, taming bed head in the morning, waking up and refreshing curls and waves, misting house plants, house cleaning, preparing clothes for ironing, etc. With 0.3mm diameter spray nozzle, this water spray bottle can deliver super-fine water mist, providing just the right amount of moisture without over-wetting your hair. Review Title: Curly hair? Perfect for you.... Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Yitrust Beach Waves Curling Iron, 1 inch 25mm Hair Crimpers and Wavers, Protable Deep Hair Waver with Adjustable LCD Temperature Dual Voltage for Hair & Long Hair (Pink) Review Date: 2019/12/19 Store: Yitrust Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Product Benefits': 'Straightening', 'Shape': 'Flat', 'Brand': 'Yitrust', 'Hair Type': 'All, Wavy, Curly, Fine, Normal', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Product Dimensions': '14 x 4 x 2 inches; 1.1 Pounds', 'UPC': '791306409054', 'Manufacturer': 'Weltop'} Review Text: The color is ice pink, very pretty. Lock slide button on top to open and close. Well placed finger grips to prevent any burn. My last similar wand was super hot to hold, nevertheless to grip it tight together. Adjustable heat. Creates pretty waves in hair. Or curl ends. Very simple to use!

Details:
Superb design for making deep beach sculpted waves and mermaid-style curly hair. A reality with this first-of-its kind waver, and curling iron in one.. Hair Curling Wand Heated Selection: LED and Keyboard plate in the handle, 9 temperature gears 120°C -200°C. “Barrel Lock” is designed to considering of Beachy Crimper Hair or Big Curls.. Deep Waver Curling Iron: Superior barrel with styling surface containing advanced ceramic tourmaline technology for healthy-looking and long-lasting hair and reduced frizz.. Benefits & Safety Curler Iron: Helps Prevent Dryness Resulting in Beautiful, Frizz Free, Shiny Styles. Global General Dual Voltage, Auto Shut-Off in 60 minutes.
Curling Iron with 360° Swivel Cord: 8ft 360° Rotatable Swivel Power Cord, no Winding, easy to use, free your hand, be like stylish. Review Title: Great color! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step: 1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments 2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases 3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns 4. raw_response:
SUMMARY:
This individual exhibits a clear preference for high-quality, effective personal care and beauty products. They consistently rate products positively, with an emphasis on functionality and performance. Their sentiment reflects satisfaction with essential features, such as sensitivity for delicate skin and ease of use, particularly in beauty tools and hair care items.

Common themes in their purchases include grooming and styling, particularly for hair and dental care, suggesting a strong interest in maintaining personal aesthetics and hygiene. The use cases frequently involve enhancing daily routines, as evidenced by products designed for hair management and effective dental hygiene.

In terms of quality preferences, this shopper appreciates items with thoughtful design and practical benefits, such as adjustable settings for temperature control and the ease of maintenance like easy cleaning. Price sensitivity appears moderate, as they opt for affordable options without sacrificing quality; the high average ratings indicate they value products that deliver solid performance regardless of slight variations in price.

Overall, their core preferences center around reliable, user-friendly products that cater to personal grooming needs while also being mindful of skin sensitivity and effectiveness.

target_interaction.title: Golden Variety Pack
target_interaction.text: Non-toxic and safe to use, washable! Strong and not easy to bend, easy to use, good for shaping nail shapes and lengths. Easily remove the ridges and broken edges on the nails. Works great for both natural nails and fake nails. Package contents 6 x 120 grits nail buffer blocks/5x 100/180 grits nail file emery boards. 5x 120/240 grits nail file emery boards. Nicely packaged. The variety and multi purpose tools of the trade. I don't know anyone who doesn't need nail files. Great for maintenance between manicures. Or just for grooming that humans must do. Good quality, should last quite awhile!
target_interaction.title_meta: Nail Files and Buffers, Teenitor 16PCS Professional Nail Manicure Tool for Acrylic Nails, 100/180 and 120/240 Grits Emery Boards 120 Grits Nail Buffer Block for Shaping and Buffing Nails

videos.title: It’s alright. But it’s exactly what I was looking for.
